title: Is Skin Preview Safe to use
body: I just wanted to know as a free player is skin preview safe to use  the customs skins not the skins riot has made please riot answer thank you

replies.body: These are third party programs which we have no control over or support.  One can never be sure of any malicious content hiding within, so it's best to use caution and be wary.  Check out our [third party](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) guide and be safe!
